SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the game. It contains the list of players and the table. The game is responsible for adding players to the game and managing the table.
See Also:
